name: Generic Resources
description: Resources that are not specific to a programming language, e.g. logic-thinking games, sites with resources for many languages, etc..

links.name: Code.org
links.description: A sampler of coding tutorials in a variety of languages.

links.name: LightBot (free version)
links.description: A simple game designed to teach logical thinking. Great for both adults and children. (free version)

links.name: LightBot (paid iOS and Android app)
links.description: A simple game designed to teach logical thinking. Great for both adults and children.

links.name: Grasshopper
links.description: A free mobile app (for iOS and Android) that teaches coding for beginners.

links.name: CargoBot
links.description: A free iOS app that teaches coding for beginners.

name: Scratch
description: Easy to learn Drag-and-drop blocks programming for kids and others new to coding.
officialDescription: Scratch helps young people learn to think creatively, reason systematically, and work collaboratively — essential skills for life in the 21st century.

links.name: Getting Started Guide
links.description: Step by step tutorial.

links.name: Starter projects
links.description: Edit existing projects created by the Scratch team.

links.name: Scratch cards
links.description: Short activities (simple tutorials with videos to follow along).

links.name: Google CS First
links.description: 8-lesson online curriculum (“Art” theme recommended, other themes also available).

links.name: Scratch Jr.
links.description: A free mobile app (for iOS and Android) that teaches coding for children (5-7).

name: Python
description: General purpose programming language, popular in college-level intro programming courses. Easy to pick up yet very powerful.
officialDescription: Whether you're new to programming or an experienced developer, it's easy to learn and use Python.

links.name: Codecademy
links.description: Step-by-step basics tutorial, learn by following instructions and writing real code.

links.name: CodeCombat
links.description: Learn coding by playing a simple game.

links.name: EarSketch
links.description: Learn to code by making music.

links.name: Trinket
links.description: A visual introduction to code using the Python programming language.

links.name: How to Think Like a Computer Scientist: Interactive Edition
links.description: A more theoretical approach to learning computer science using the Python language and interactive examples.

links.name: Learn Python the Hard Way
links.description: A textbook approach to learning Python with lots of examples (costs money, but has a free sample with 8 exercises).

name: Javascript
description: General purpose programming language, the language of the web - used to create websites
officialDescription: While it is most well-known as the scripting language for Web pages, Javascript is used for many other purposes.

links.name: FreeCodeCamp
links.description: 100s of hours of web development tutorials for all levels, 100% free.

links.name: Codecademy
links.description: Step-by-step basics tutorial, learn by following instructions and writing real code.

links.name: CodeCombat
links.description: Learn coding by playing a simple game.

links.name: Khan Academy
links.description: Step-by-step tutorial with videos.

links.name: EarSketch
links.description: Learn to code by making music.

links.name: CodeGuppy
links.description: Beginner tutorials to learn by doing.

links.name: JavaScript30
links.description: 30 stand alone video tutorials for beginners, learn by writing real code.

links.name: App Lab by code.org
links.description: A programming environment where you can make simple apps with Javascript using blocks or text.

links.name: Learn to code with Karel the dog
links.description: 2D problem solving exercises.

name: HTML & CSS
description: HTML & CSS are the most basic building blocks of any website. HTML defines the structure, CSS defines the visual styles.

links.name: FreeCodeCamp
links.description: 100s of hours of web development tutorials for all levels, 100% free.

links.name: Codecademy
links.description: Step-by-step basics tutorial, learn by following instructions and writing real code.

links.name: Khan Academy
links.description: Step-by-step tutorial with videos.

name: Processing
description: Processing is a flexible software sketchbook and a language for learning how to code within the context of the visual arts.

links.name: Sketchpad
links.description: Online Processing development environment.

links.name: Creative Coding Video Tutorials by Daniel Shiffman
links.description: YouTube tutorials.

name: Java
description: General purpose programming language, used mostly for servers applications and Android apps.

links.name: Codecademy
links.description: Step-by-step basics tutorial, learn by following instructions and writing real code.
